headline: Trump Touts $92 Billion AI, Energy Projects in Key Swing State
summary: Google and  Blackstone  announced major investments in artificial-intelligence infrastructure Tuesday at the Pennsylvania Energy and Innovation Summit.  Other investments in the state include $15 billion in financing led by Knighthead Capital Management for a natural-gas powered data center in Indiana County in partnership with  EQT Corp  and $6 billion from AI cloud company CoreWeave for “a new, state-of-the-art data center” in Lancaster, Pa.

headline: Trump-Backed Investors Go $90B Big in Pennsylvania
summary: President Trump has joined energy and tech companies in a program pledging investments totaling $90 billion to boost AI efforts in Pennsylvania.

raw.headline: Trump-Backed Investors Go $90B Big in Pennsylvania
raw.summary: President Trump has joined energy and tech companies in a program pledging investments totaling $90 billion to boost AI efforts in Pennsylvania.

headline: PPL Corporation and Blackstone Infrastructure create joint venture to build natural gas generation in Pennsylvania in support of data center development
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) ("PPL") and Blackstone Infrastructure today announced that they have formed a joint venture to build, own and operate new gas-fired, combined-cycle generation stations to power data centers under long-term energy services agreements (ESA). The announcement was made at the Pennsylvania Energy and Innovation Summit hosted by Sen. David McCormick at Carnegie Mellon University in Pittsburgh.

headline: How Will PPL's Capital Investments Shape Its Future Growth?
summary: PPL aims for a regulated capital investment plan of $20 billion during 2025-2028.
